nodes.text: The Lifedetec bioscanner was produced by CryonCorp. An instrument commonly used by scientists and security personnel, the scanner could detect the presence of lifeforms. The Lifedetect could also pinpoint their location, as well as determine what species it was as long as the profile had been loaded into indicators. The Lifedetec was the size of a portable computer, and employed a shoulder strap for easy carrying. The Lifedetect was an early model of the EnhanceScan general-purpose scanner, which added communication, metal detection, and motion sensor functions to the device.
